title: Ravi Gastropub and Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, International, Organic, Beer/Wine
description: A vegetarian place with a large vegan selection. Also has a large selection of artisanal beers and in-house-made sodas as well as wine and sangria. Vegan options are clearly labelled on menu as well as vegetarian options that can be made vegan. They specialize in salads, pizzas, sandwiches and pasta.
